error_report: ITBench incident 1: User bump and thereby request surge with no autoscaling enabled. This scenario simulates the OpenTelemetry Demo's services being flooded with requests.
ITBench incident 102: Misconfigured resource quota. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `ad` service unable to run due to a resource quota on the namespace.
ITBench incident 105: Invalid command executed in pod. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `product-catalog` service having a malformed command.

ITBench incident 16: Misconfigured shipping service environment variable. This scenario changes the environment variables of OpenTelemetry Demo's `shipping` service, causing it to be unable to reach the `quote` service.
ITBench incident 51: API Server Error Rate Spike - API Request Surge.
ITBench incident 53: API Server Error Rate Spike - etcd Latency. This scenario simulates BookInfo's `reviews-v3` service being unable to start due to lack of persistent storage.
ITBench incident 54: API Server Error Rate Spike - API Server Memory Stress.
ITBench incident 18: checkoutservice Pod Failure Chaos. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `checkout` service experiencing a failure.
ITBench incident 20: productcatalogservice Corrupt Image. This scenario simulates the OpenTelemetry Demo's `product-catalog` service using the wrong image.
ITBench incident 52: Signing Service Resource Exhaustion with Message Queue Backlog.
ITBench incident 23: checkoutservice Corrupt Image. This scenario changes the environment variables of OpenTelemetry Demo's `shipping` service, causing it to be unable to reach the `quote` service.
ITBench incident 26: HTTP request tamper fault. This scenario simulates tampered HTTP requests to OpenTelemetry Demo's `email` service.
ITBench incident 27: Abort HTTP request fault. This scenario simulates aborted HTTP requests to OpenTelemetry Demo's `quote` service.
ITBench incident 3: Ad Service CPU. This scenario simulates the OpenTelemetry Demo's `ad` service experiencing high CPU usage.
ITBench incident 30: Misconfigured Ad Service port. This scenario changes the specified port of OpenTelemetry Demo's `ad` service.
ITBench incident 31: Frontend Network Traffic Blocked. This scenario simulates all ingress traffic being blocked on OpenTelemetry Demo's `frontend` service.
ITBench incident 33: Invalid node selector on pod. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `ad` and `cart` services being deployed on the wrong node.
ITBench incident 34: CartService Incorrect Authentication. This scenario simulates the wrong password being set as the user for OpenTelemetry Demo's `valkey-cart` service.
ITBench incident 37: Valid Cost Increase. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo services running normally with autoscaling.
ITBench incident 38: Misconfigured HPA Cost Increase. This scenario simulates several OpenTelemetry Demo services being incorrectly autoscaled.
ITBench incident 39: PodDisruptionBudget Blocking Node Drain. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `payment` service being unable to schedule a new pod.
ITBench incident 40: Fill Database Storage. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `valkey-cart` service experiencing an Out of Memory (OOM) error.
ITBench incident 41: Exhaust Node Resources. This scenario simulates the OpenTelemetry Demo's `cart` service consuming most of the node's available memory.
ITBench incident 42: Pod Priority-Based Eviction Cascade. This scenario simulates the OpenTelemetry Demo's `kafka` service being evicted from the node.
ITBench incident 43: DNS Misconfiguration. This scenario simulates the OpenTelemetry Demo's `frontend` service being reach other services.
ITBench incident 44: Pod Anti-Affinity Preventing Rescheduling. This scenario simulates new pods of OpenTelemetry Demo's `payment` service being unscheduleable.
ITBench incident 45: Init-Container Hang. This scenario simulates new pods of OpenTelemetry Demo's `email` service being unable to execute.
ITBench incident 46: Low Resource Limits. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `postgresql` service not having enough resources.
ITBench incident 47: Istio Authorization Policy Deny Incident. This scenario simulates BookInfo's `gateway` service unable to receive GET HTTP requests.
ITBench incident 48: Istio Disabled Ambient Mode Incident. This scenario simulates BookInfo's `gateway` service unable to receive GET HTTP requests.
ITBench incident 49: Readiness Probe Flapping. This scenario simulates OpenTelemetry Demo's `frontend` service having a malformed readiness probe.
ITBench incident 50: Kubernetes Gateway Invalid TLS Certificates. This scenario simulates BookInfo's `productpage-v1` service being unable to communicate with other services.
